from: {@item +2 studded leather armor of magic resistance|PT}

trait.name: Special Equipment.
entries: Scanlan wields {@item Lagrima Plateada|PT}, wears {@item +2 Studded Leather Armor of Magic Resistance|PT} and a {@item +2 ring of protection|tdcsr}, and carries a {@item hat of disguise} and a {@item wand of magic missiles} that doesnt break if used by magnus.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The Magnus has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the Magnus to sleep.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Magnus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Focused
entries: Magnus has advantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain {@status concentration} on spells.

trait.name: Toughness.
entries: Magnus has an additional 40 hit points.

trait.name: Luck by my side
entries: While attuned to {@item Lagrima Plateada|PT}, Magnus gain 10 speed and opportunity attacks are made with disadvantage against him, also it speed cannot be reduced by any means and it ignores difficult terrain.

action.name: Extra Attack
entries: Magnus can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.

action.name: Lagrima Plateada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d8 + 11}) slashing damage, or 14 ({@damage 1d10 + 11}) slashing damage if used with both hands, plus 4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) force damage.

bonus.name: Arcane Fist (8th Level).
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}45 ({@damage 10d8}) force damage. Magnus can use this bonus action only while {@status concentration||concentrating} on the arcane hand spell.

bonus.name: Bardic Inspiration (6/Short Rest).
entries: Magnus grants a Bardic Inspiration die to one creature within 60 feet of him who can hear him. Once within the next 10 minutes, the creature can roll a {@dice d12} and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes. When Magnus uses this ability, he gains advantage on attack rolls with  {@item Lagrima Plateada|PT} until the end of his turn

bonus.name: Healing Word (5th Level).
entries: Magnus casts healing word, restoring 18 ({@dice 5d4 + 6}) hit points to himself or another creature he can see within 60 feet of him.

reaction.name: Opportunity Atack
entries: When an enemy leaves your reach and you make a opportunity attack, you can cast {@spell magic missile} without using a spell slot as part of the oportunity attack you make, targettng the creature you are attacking. You dont need to do verbal or somatic components and you dont need to be able to cast the spell for this reaction to take place.

reaction.name: Cutting Words.
entries: When a creature Scanlan can see within 60 feet of him makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a damage roll, he can expend a use of Bardic Inspiration to roll a {@dice d12} and subtract the number rolled from the creature's roll. The creature also has disadvantage on its next saving throw.
